GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.20 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
powerpc/spufs: Fix refcount leak in spufs_init_isolated_loader

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 85aff6a9b7b7ec4e5c319f7946c9864c8d5e3d4a, it was introduced in version v2.6.20 by commit 0afacde3df4c9980f505d9afd7cb0058389732ca. For more details please see the references link.
